other_title: Bakuten Shoot Beyblade The Movie: Gekitō!! Takao vs Daichi (Japanese)
Beyblade the Movie: Fierce Battle! Takao VS Daichi (Japanese)
爆転シュートベイブレード THE MOVIE 激闘!!タカオVS大地 (Japanese)
plot: The Bladebreakers are on a well deserved vacation. But, a hyperactive kid named Daichi continues to pursue Tyson for a rematch after his defeat in the Beyblade World Championships. The Bladebreakers' vacation eventually takes a turn for the worst once they encounter mysterious beybladers who claim to be the Dark Spirits sealed inside a strange temple. With Daichi under their control, the Shadow Bladers seek to destroy the world with their Dark Bit Beasts. Together, Tyson, Max, Ray, and Kai must save not only Daichi... but the world as well...
ending_theme: "Poro Poro (ポロポロ)" by Hana Hana
